TopicTitle: Under the Condor's wings A STS history

Articles.Content:
A Mission Report By Cap Penguin

After the mun program wrapped up, it was clear that government funding for the Kerbal Space Program was going to be reduced significantly. So the engineers at the KSC persuaded Gene and Mortimer that a reusable shuttle would allow the program to continue manned missions at a high tempo with a lower cost than the early space programs.  So a contract was sent out to the local aerospace companies for proposals. The following is a report of the outcome of this directive.
